name: Data Application Patterns
title: Data Application Patterns
description: Streamlit dashboards, data loading, caching, session state, chart patterns for data applications

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Schema validation and caching keys enable reproducible data flows
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Session state and form validation protect user inputs and preferences
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Declarative dashboard structure makes data flow clear
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Input validation and deployment best practices prevent harmful outcomes
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified patterns for Streamlit dashboards, caching, and charts
